name: Sleeping Souls
description:
Description:

You have been selected by the emperor to bring peace back to the sleeping souls, from the evil spirits.
Includes 20 levels and NewGame+

Keyboard Controls:

Move: Arrow Keys
Jump: Spacebar

Xbox controller:

Move: Left Stick
Jump: A

Android Controls:

As directed in game, left side buttons are movement and right side button is jump

Development by:

Jeru Sanders & Jayden Spencer aka Team Omni

You can find us on twitter here:
https://twitter.com/Team_Omni

Or

e-mail us for any problems or questions you may have:

info@team-omni dot com
